H0.text: The hand lens is easier to carry on field investigations, which is one advantage of a hand lens over a microscope.

H1.text: The hand lens is less likely to be infected by bacteria compared to a microscope.

H2.text: A hand lens makes very tiny objects appear larger, which is one advantage over a microscope.

H3.text: Producing a more accurate image is one advantage of a hand lens over a microscope.

A4.text: The convex lens of a magnifying glass can be used to produce a magnified image of an object.
